SEARCH
Package fr.istic.aco.editor.Memento

Class EditorMemento

java.lang.Object
fr.istic.aco.editor.Memento.EditorMemento
All Implemented Interfaces:
Memento
public class EditorMemento extends Object implements Memento
The EditorMemento class is an implementation of the Memento interface. It captures and stores the state of the text editor, including the buffer content, the selected text range, and the clipboard content. This class is used to facilitate undo/redo operations by storing snapshots of the editor's state.

      public boolean equals(Object obj)
      Compares this EditorMemento to another object for equality. Two mementos are considered equal if their buffer content, selection indices, and clipboard content are all the same.
